text: Nge Mangsham Taktsab (, ? - 727) was a general of Tibetan Empire. According to Tibetan Annals, Mangsham was appointed as the Lönchen in 725 after Shang Trisumje's death. He was ordered to convene a spring coalition in 726, and levied taxes on people whom were directly subordinate to the emperor. He died in the next year and succeeded by another general, We Tadra Khonglo. ==References== *Old Tibetan Annals (version I), I.T.J. 0750 *Old Tibetan Chronicle, P.T. 1287 Category:8th-century Tibetan people Category:Tibetan Empire Category:727 deaths Category:Date of birth unknown
title: Nge Mangsham Taktsab
